about_the_game:
Story

You are a young masseur who has been trained since childhood, inheriting exceptional skills passed down through generations. For personal reasons, you decided to leave home and open a small massage studio in an apartment near a university.

One day, by chance, you meet a girl who is a member of the university's basketball club. She is the second strongest player on the team, with her sights set on winning the national championship. However, she is currently struggling with a foot injury. After hearing her story, you decide to help her.

As a skilled masseur, you must design a massage therapy plan to gradually heal her injury. Using your inherited techniques and bold methods, you will enhance her physical abilities and help her achieve victory.

With less than two months left until the competition, an exciting and heartwarming journey of rehabilitation begins…

Game Features

  • Engaging mini-games featuring various massage activities

  • Relaxing daily life simulation and character development

  • Intimate physical interactions with a shy and athletic heroine

  • Three different endings for you to discover

  • Dynamic Live2D animated H-scenes

Character Introduction

Akituki Noa

A member of the women's basketball club, Noa is second only to the team captain in skill. She has beautiful long hair and a well-toned, healthy body. Her goal is to win the national championship. Although she shines on the court, off the field, she is a reserved and shy girl.

Gameplay

  • Earn money to purchase massage tools and unlock more advanced techniques.

  • Use your finely honed massage skills to improve the heroine’s physical abilities.

  • Spend intimate nights with the heroine, allowing for deeper connections.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is not suitable for all ages.

!!WARNING!! 
This game contains adult content, including nudity and explicit sexual scenes. Please ensure you are comfortable with the content before proceeding. All characters depicted in adult scenes are 18 or older.

CONTENT:
The game is set in a massage parlor and features themes of romance, comedy, and inspiration. Enjoy the game with peace of mind!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mojave 10.14+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, Intel Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mojave 10.14+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, Intel Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Love Relaxation

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: x64
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Love Relaxation is a dating sims. This spring, you meet a young girl who has suffered a severe injury during basketball practice. As a professional masseuse, you decide to help her recover. As you spend time together through massage therapy, your feelings for each other begin to grow…
